title: The Sharp Smart IntelliDos takes most of the faff out of doing the laundry
description:
![sharp Smart IntelliDos washing machine amazon dash replenishment ifa
2018](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Sharp has unveiled the shiny new Smart IntelliDos, a washing machine that
takes most of the faff out of doing the laundry, at[IFA
2018](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ifa-2018-3497586).**

It’s an [Amazon Dash
Replenishment](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/amazon-dash-replenishment-
service-3514666) washing machine, which means it’s smart enough to calculate
and use exactly the right amount of detergent (both powder and liquid) and
softener for up to 20 loads, track your usage of those products, and
automatically order fresh supplies when it thinks you’re running low.

**Related:[Best washing machine](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
washing-machine-3431783)**

The likes of Bosch, Siemens, Beko, Candy and Hoover, by the way, are also
working on washing machines that play nice with Dash Replenishment.

The Amazon Dash and Dash Replenishment services have been sneered at for
sometimes being infantile, but a washing machine that can largely look after
itself is something we can get on board with for a couple of reasons.

Washing machines and cleaning supplies − for obvious reasons − tend to be kept
out of sight, and are therefore easy to forget about. And the hefty boxes and
bottles that detergent and fabric softener are sold in aren’t much fun to drag
home from the shops.

Before you can start taking advantage of Dash Replenishment, you first need to
register the Smart IntelliDos to your Amazon account, and input your preferred
detergent and softener, payment method and shipping address.

Once that’s done, all you need to do is load up the washing machine drawer
compartments and choose a wash programme.

Though the Smart IntelliDos will calculate and distribute precise amounts of
detergent and fabric softener with every load, you can either raise or lower
the dosage by diving into the settings.

Whats’ more, if that tweak results in the IntelliDos placing an automatic re-
order a touch too soon, you can cancel it − the machine will wait a further
five days before re-re-ordering.

**Read more:[Best vacuum cleaner](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-
vacuum-cleaner)**

It also offers extremely speedy 12-minute wash cycles for when you’re running
low on time, and with a feature called Auto Load Sensor, it can calculate and
set the ideal energy and water usage, and programme duration for every load
too.

Sharp says the Smart IntelliDos will hit the market in Q2 2019, and it will
cost approximately €999 (~£900).
